mng: definitely, absolutely (not), (scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right., Tut!, to grind, close to, eager, to correspond to, see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

exm.mng: to switch over, to switch modes or data streams, to cut (to a new scene)
close, familiar, intimate, closely (related), to foster close ties, to pay close attention
to excise, to cut out (a tumor)
to fit in with, to suit, appropriate
